name: The Big Mining - Pre-Alpha version
description:
Ayla is excited for her first day as the newest miner in her village. What makes this even more special is the fact that she is replacing her father, the greatest miner her village ever had, and who had just retired. However, not everything goes as expected, and Ayla finds herself with an unexpected reality: Everyone in her village regards her father more highly than her.

Now, what should have been her first day of work turns out to be the beginning of a journey to prove her worth...

The question is, it worth it?
